Package com.nhaarman.listviewanimations.widget

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    DynamicListView.OnHoverCellListener  
    DynamicListView.OnItemMovedListener
    Implement this interface to be notified of ordering changes.
    DynamicListView.Swappable
    Interface, usually implemented by a BaseAdapterDecorator, that indicates that it can swap the visual position of two list items.
    DynamicListView.SwipeOnTouchListener
    An OnTouchListener that should be used when list-view items can be swiped horizontally.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DynamicListView
    The DynamicListView is an extension of ListView that supports cell dragging and swapping.
